sub_title: Lecturer Chemistry and Head of Chemistry Department
summary:
Broadly oriented chemist with a strong R&D background and passion for research. Additional working experience in Business (Sales and Marketing) and Teaching have created eye for transferring knowledge to applications. Having throughout my career fulfilled numerous administrative related functions (at work related confederations such as KNCV, NVVL, President of representative advisory board etc.) there is because of that certainly also ambition towards managerial and policy related positions.

Well anything personal perhaps? My hobbies and interests are I think just as versatile as my resume. I love to travel (city tours, museum visits but also occasionally nothing but deliciously in the sun with a good book), going out to dinner with good company, in terms of sport I like playing chess and snooker and, last but not least, I like to go to theatre (especially comedy but from time to time a beautiful (classical) concert as well).  My interests are, among others, Goethe, Wagner, philosophy, whisky and biographies of interesting people.
